title: New Stem Cell Therapy Aims at Repair
description: Science and medicine have come a long way since multiple sclerosis was first considered a diagnosis in the 1800s. Since that time, we have advanced to many different types of therapies. One of the newest treatments available is stem cell therapy.

frontMatter.sidebar_label: Life with MS—New Stem Cell Therapy Aims at Repair
